settings.text: Xtrallux vs Other Brands
Xtra Lasers. Xtra Features. Xtra Value.

Why settle for less? Xtrallux laser caps are the most powerful wearable laser device on the market for hair growth with more lasers in each price category. Regrow your hair with the most powerful laser caps in the market.

settings.text: MORE LASERS & DENSITY
Xtra Hair Density

Get more lasers reaching where they need to stimulate more follicle growth on your scalp. Xtrallux provides xtra density for your hair at an excellent value.

Our hair growth caps target the follicle by using only laser light - no LEDs which lose light energy from the source to the target.
Assembled in the USA
Xtra Durable

Xtrallux takes pride in its commitment to quality, assembling each device right here in the USA. This close-to-home production allows for meticulous quality control, ensuring every component meets the highest durability and performance standards. This American assembly not only reinforces the robustness of our products but also enhances our service capabilities, providing our customers with reliable, long-lasting solutions for their hair regrowth needs.
Wear 6 Minutes Daily
Xtra Fast

In today's fast-paced world, finding time for self-care can be a challenge, but Xtrallux makes it easy. With a remarkably short daily treatment time of just 6 minutes, Xtrallux seamlessly integrates into even the busiest schedules, encouraging consistent use. Our wearable, battery-powered design allows you to continue your day-to-day activities uninterrupted. This convenience is critical to ensuring user compliance, making Xtrallux an advanced solution for hair regrowth and a practical one for your hectic lifestyle.
Comparing Xtrallux with Other Brands

We don't just meet expectations; we exceed them with more lasers, superior convenience, and complete privacy.
Take a look at our comparison below

Discover Xtrallux's Power
Superior Laser Coverage Across All Price Ranges.

settings.text: Xtrallux is Backed by Hair Loss Experts
Physicians recommend Xtrallux for its clinically proven effectiveness and advanced technology in promoting hair regrowth and scalp health.
Xtrallux: A new chapter by the original LLLT visionaries.

settings.custom_html:
Carlos Piña, CEO of Xtrallux and a former hair loss patient, leveraged his personal and professional experiences to innovate in the hair restoration field. He founded Capillus1 in 2012, creating the CapillusPro1, a pioneering home-use light therapy solution for hair loss.

After years of success and growth with Capillus1, the Piña family shifted focus in 2021, departing to develop Xtrallux in Miami. This new venture represents their continued dedication to evolving hair loss treatments, introducing more advanced and powerful devices to the market.

1Please note: The Capillus company, Curallux, and their respective brands are trademarks of their owners and are NOT associated with Xtrallux.

settings.heading: Xtrallux Quality and Service
settings.description: The Xtrallux team prioritizes top-quality products and outstanding service, demonstrating their commitment to customer satisfaction.

settings.heading: Is Laser Therapy Right for Your Hair Loss?
settings.content: Xtrallux Hair Regrowth caps are recommended for adults (men or women) who are experiencing mild to moderate hair loss due to androgenic alopecia with Fitzpatrick Skin Types I to IV as per indications for use. If your hair loss is advanced or due to scarring alopecias, this device is not right for you. Please consult with your healthcare provider for other types of hair loss (ie. medically-induced, areata, universalis, or totalis alopecias, effluvium, etc) and skin types.

settings.heading: Will laser therapy work for me if I'm bald?
settings.content: Xtrallux is indicated for mild to moderate hair loss cases. If you're hair loss is advanced, you are not a candidate for laser therapy. Please read the indications for use on the product pages for detail.

settings.heading: Is laser therapy dangerous for dark skin tones?
settings.content: Laser therapy at 650 nm and <5mW has never had any reported adverse effects for ANY skin tone, including the darkest of skin tones but due to limitations in testing protocols has only been clinically tested for treatment of AGA on skin types 1-4. Xtrallux devices are not cleared for dark skin tones due to the substantial equivalence process of FDA clearances.

settings.heading: Does laser therapy really work to treat hair loss?
settings.content:
Yes. The United States Food & Drug Administration has cleared Xtrallux hair regrowth devices as effective for treating androgenetic alopecia (see full indication for use). The clearance is based on substantiation by earlier submissions to the FDA providing clinical data to verify that this type of medical device emitting red laser energy results in an increase in terminal hair counts over the course of time with continued use. Terminal hair is defined as long, coarse, well-pigmented hair which differs from vellus hair. 

Xtrallux manufactures devices use this technology which has been proven to increase counts of terminal hair in clinical trials accepted as substantiation by the FDA for prior clearances for this device classification.

Keep in mind that results will vary from person to person. Each case is different.
